attributes.action: create a safe buses system on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because it is a new town, my home town has a very transcient population - there are lots of newcomers and people trying to find their way about. In my professional experience, one of the pupils I teach got lost on the way to school - easily done since Warrington's transport system is notoriously complex. It occurred to me that one safe system may be for regular bus users udner 12, say, to liaise with bus drivers. What about a policy that shows your administration takes child safety seriously and create a "Safe To School" registration system ? Just an idea from my think tank.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
